{{ddcl | since=c++23 |
~basic_stacktrace();
}}

Destructs the {{tt|basic_stacktrace}}. The destructors of the {{lc|std::stacktrace_entry}} objects it holds are called and the used storage is deallocated.

===Complexity===
Linear in the size of the {{tt|basic_stacktrace}}.
